text: Bala Singh (24 April 1952 â€“ 27 November 2019) was an Indian actor. He appeared in Tamil language movies. He made his first movie appearance on Avatharam (1995). He was known for his villain roles such as in Kaama and in Pudhupettai. Singh died of cardiac arrest caused by food poisoning in Chennai on 27 November 2019, aged 67. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:Deaths from food poisoning Category:Indian actors
title: Bala Singh
